MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L11 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Griffin Close, Unicorn Road and surrounding streets. In order to remove the generator, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 02:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:24PM on 8th April 2021.
